#Darth Modus - I know it used to be 'organised' but one could hardly count on the few labelled ids and ctrl-f is needed to find anything anyway, so I just
#merged everything together to more easily search, copy, and paste. Plus it was getting to a point where there were enough changes that is was
#pointless to compare with vanilla anyway. Hope this doesn't mess with anyone's submod.

#Using this primarily for wet tropics with 'exotic' diseases
tropical = {
	5140 5141 1164 1165 1166 1167 1169 1170 1171 1172 1901 2948 2949 798 1168 1114 1117 1118 1119 1120 1121 1122 1124 1125 1126 1136 1137 1138 1139 1140 1141

#Using this only for true deserts, generally with under 200mm or so annual precipitation, and with sand dunes or sun-baked rock

#Generally using this for areas around or above the tree line, with at least sporadic permafrost, average winter temperatures of at least -20C, and yearly mean temperature of at least sub zero
arctic = {
	1034 1035 1036 1037 1038 1039 1040 1041 1042 1043 1044 1045 1046 1047 1051 1052 1054 1055 1059 1061 1062 1064 1067 1068 1069 1070 1071 1072 1073 1074 1075 1076 1078 1080 2427 2425 2426 1780 2445 2428 2429 2433 2430 2432 2431 2436 2442 2437 2435 2446 2438 2439 2440 998 999 1005 1006 2592 2574 676 705 2102 2128 2129 2134 1781 1782 1783 1787 1804 1805 1807 1811 1812 371 1104 1105 1777 315 2025 4205 4514 4515 4516 4518 4519 4520 4690 4691 7496
	#4690 doesn't exist in vanilla but it creates a nicer border.

	#Victorum Universalis New
	3111 2135 2133 678 2131 2132 4517 2071 2070 1056 5649 7864 7747 7789 21 3112 3113 3114 3119 3284 3285 4129 677 2130 1810 5177 5178 4968 4969 4970 4971 5186 5188 5190 5191 4977 4976 4978 4980 4985 4990 4991 4992 4993 4994 4995 4996 4997 4998 5006 5007 4999 5123 5120 4983 4986 4989 4987 2599 5001 2595 5002 5040 5041 5192 5187 5189 5195 5015 5008 5009 5010 5011 5014 5176 2575 5012 997 5093 5067 5068 5069 5070 5071 5072 5073 5074 5075 5076 5077 5078 5079 5588 5589 5590 5591 5592 5593 5594 5595 5596 5650 5673 5674 5675 5677 5678 4257 5722 5080 5081 5082 5084 5899 5911 5912 5913 5914 5915 5916 5917 5918 5919 8000 8001 8002 8003 8004 8005 8006 8007 8008 8009 8010 8011 8012 5193 5087 5573 5587 5639 5580 5641 1806 5003 2594 4151 8545

	#Iffy NA borderline subarctic I've changed over 5 times already
	#1000 1003 5003 5005 1806 2594 5055 2577 2576 996
	#21 11 18
	
	#VU - San Felipe Fix
	2601 3348 3349 4984 5033 5086 5895 5900 6128
